string.text:
Cartridge with buckshot charge. Application range up to 25 meters. It is used for firing from the KS-23 carbine. Due to the fact that the barrel has rifling in the KS-23 carbine, the buckshot flies over a large area, which allows you to shoot offhand, practically without aiming.
 
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] Armor penetration power: %c[ui_gray_2]BR3 (6 x 6)
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] Flesh damage power: %c[ui_gray_2]285 (47.5 x 6)

A cartridge with a steel pointed bullet. It is used to forcibly stop vehicles by damaging them. Application range up to 100 meters. It is used for firing from the KS-23 carbine.
 
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] Armor penetration power: %c[ui_gray_2]BR5 (51)
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] Flesh damage power: %c[ui_gray_2]133

Pistol cartridge with a bullet of increased penetration. Designed to destroy manpower protected by personal protective equipment. The nose part of the heat-strengthened steel core protrudes from the shell, due to which a high penetration effect of the bullet is achieved.
 
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] Armor penetration power: %c[ui_gray_2]BR3 (32)
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] Flesh damage power: %c[ui_gray_2]24

Standard 20-calibre round filled with 6mm buckshot. Highly lethal at close range. Only suitable for use with smoothbore weapons
%c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Highest pierced armor class: %c[ui_gray_2]none
%c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2]Tissue damage rating: %c[ui_gray_2]medium • high
%c[ui_gray_2]SPECIAL:
%c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] expanding cloud of pellets, short eff. range
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] Armor penetration power: %c[ui_gray_2]None (3 x 9)
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] Flesh damage power: %c[ui_gray_2]143 (16 x 9)

A special cartridge designed for the needs of the scientific staff located in the Zone. Depending on the task, it is filled with different types of solutions. Requires very careful handling. How to use: very slowly put into the weapon.
 
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] Highest pierced armor class: %c[ui_gray_2]none
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] Tissue damage rating: %c[ui_gray_2]none
 %c[0,255,255,255]UNIQUE: %c[0,250,250,0] Using a thin wolfram needle, it pierces the skin to inject the solution.

A VOG-30 fragmentation grenade is designed to destroy enemy manpower and fire weapons located in open areas. An improved version in comparison with analogues, developed in the 1980s, has a more powerful fragmentation effect, as well as autonomous sealing of the propellant charge in the cartridge.\n \n

The .338 Federal is a rifle cartridge based on the .308 Winchester case necked up to .33 caliber. It was created by Federal Cartridge and Sako in 2006 and intended as a big game cartridge with reasonable recoil for lightweight rifles.
 
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255]Highest pierced armor class: %c[ui_gray_2]BR2 (18)
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255]Tissue damage rating: %c[ui_gray_2]212
